Anakin Skywalker.Action: Smiles while blasting enemy droids and compliments Obi-Wan's piloting skill, showing camaraderie and confidence in his ally.
Encourages and supports Obi-Wan during the combat, giving tactical advice, coordinates with Artoo, and celebrates their success together.
Suggests a tactical maneuver to split enemy fighters and confidently directs Obi-Wan.
Successfully blasts one enemy droid fighter and pursues the second with precision.
Coordinates smoothly with Artoo and Obi-Wan under pressure, maintaining situational awareness.
Drops in behind the Droid Drop Fighter and destroys it efficiently, showing good piloting and combat skill.
Quickly communicates and directs his astromech droid to lock onto targets and gather tactical information.
Shows excitement after shooting down an enemy ship but continues to focus on the mission.
Flies in unison with Obi-Wan, backs him up in combat.
Shows enthusiasm in battle ('This is where the fun begins').
Engages multiple enemy fighters head on and coordinates with Obi-Wan, executing skilled maneuvers to eliminate all but one enemy droid.
Confidently states 'This is where the fun begins' before battle, demonstrating confidence and readiness.
Encourages and reassures Artoo during the dangerous flight maneuvers.
Displays some impatience or tension with Obi-Wan's repeated warnings but ultimately listens.
Shows determination to protect and survive despite risks, prioritizing mission over caution.
Reassures Artoo during panic and encourages positive thinking.
Decides to help fellow clone pilots under attack despite orders to focus on own mission.
Protects Obi-Wan by firing on Buzz Droids attacking Obi-Wan's starfighter and giving him tactical support verbally.
Refuses to leave Obi-Wan and stays to protect him despite danger.
Physically knocks Buzz Droids off Obi-Wan's ship, accidentally damaging it.
Attempts to protect Obi-Wan by moving his ship next to Obi-Wan's and physically knocking buzz droids off despite the risk and damage caused.
Successfully knocks off multiple buzz droids and commands Artoo to target the attacking droid, demonstrating situational awareness and teamwork.
Fails to notice the shields are still active before trying to advance, but quickly recovers and blasts the shield generator effectively.
Keeps calm and guides Obi-Wan toward the hangar despite damage and chaos, showing confident piloting and strategic thinking.
Cuts through battle droids to assist Obi-Wan, shows willingness to protect and support an ally.
Orders Artoo to stay with the ship and wait for orders, demonstrating trust and responsibility.
Maneuvers his ship skillfully to enter the hangar just before the blast doors close.
Jumps out of his ship and cuts through battle droids effectively to reach Obi-Wan.
Cooperates with Obi-Wan and follows strategy to locate the Chancellor using the ship's computers.
Demonstrates situational awareness by sensing Count Dooku and recognizing the presence of a trap.
Follows Obi-Wan's lead and strategic advice to spring the trap, showing understanding of tactical planning.
Orders Artoo to stay with the ship for safety and communication, showing foresight and responsibility.
Grins at Obi-Wan and runs with him during dangerous moments, showing camaraderie and shared effort.
Responds quickly and effectively to threats, deflecting laser bolts to protect himself and Obi-Wan.
Displays teamwork with Obi-Wan by cooperating in combat and escape.
Engages nonverbally and physically without aggressive hostility beyond necessary self-defense.
Grins confidently at Obi-Wan after an explosion, showing assurance in their success.
Skillfully deflects laser bolts from multiple Destroyer Droids during an ambush.
Quickly activates lightsaber and destroys incoming Battle Droids along with Obi-Wan.
Fails to notice or press the elevator stop button, resulting in an unexpected halt.
Responds flexibly to elevator failure by igniting his lightsaber and preparing for alternate action.
Cuts a hole in the elevator ceiling to assist Obi-Wan and Artoo's escape.
Struggles to hang on to the elevator shaft edge to presumably aid in the mission and his companions' safety.
Calculates escape plan and flips into the elevator shaft to avoid enemy droids.
Calculates momentarily under threat and pushes himself to flip into the elevator shaft, avoiding capture and using the elevator's movement to defeat the attacking battle droids.
Teams up with Obi-Wan and fights Count Dooku to protect the Chancellor and defeat a dangerous Sith Lord.
Becomes angry and aggressive during the fight, focused on proving his power.
Rushes to free unconscious Obi-Wan and checks his condition.
Refuses to leave Obi-Wan behind despite urgency, carrying him on his shoulder to safety.
Rushes to Obi-Wan's side and checks his condition quickly and effectively.
Decides to carry Obi-Wan instead of leaving him behind despite risk to himself and others.
Communicates clearly with Artoo to activate a specific elevator when the main one is not working.
Jumps to elevator door frame and assesses the dangerous situation as the ship shifts.
Carries Obi-Wan on his shoulder while running to escape, urging them to be fast to save themselves.
Jumps into a horizontal elevator shaft and quickly takes initiative to move forward with urgency, urging others to be fast.
Carries Obi-Wan on his back while navigating a rolling, dangerous elevator shaft, demonstrating physical skill and determination.
Successfully adapts to the ship rolling and jumping from one side of the elevator to the other to maintain progress.
Cuts a control box to try to open the elevator doors while carrying Obi-Wan on his back, showing multitasking and quick problem-solving under pressure.
Grabs wires with one hand to hold on during the ship's sudden angle movement, demonstrating physical skill and presence of mind in a dangerous situation.
Calmly assesses the situation and warns Obi-Wan about their dangerous position in the elevator shaft, showing situational awareness.
Commands Artoo to shut down the elevator to avoid collision, showing decisiveness and use of available resources.
Fails to prevent the elevator from moving despite ordering Artoo to shut it down, indicating a limitation in control over the environment.
Successfully uses grappling hooks to catch onto the shaft and swing into an open elevator door along with Obi-Wan and Palpatine, displaying resourcefulness, agility, and clear-headedness.
Offers his utility cable to Chancellor Palpatine and instructs him to hold on during a dangerous situation.
Agrees with Obi-Wan that no ships in the hangar bay will get them anywhere, showing practical acceptance.
Looks to Obi-Wan for guidance when unsure what to do next.
Acknowledges the lack of viable ships and admits uncertainty about the escape plan.
Quickly secures Chancellor Palpatine with a cable around his waist to prepare for dangerous conditions.
Uses utility cables to swing to pipes and attempt to navigate the unstable hangar environment.
Maintains his grip and pulls Palpatine back to safety despite dangerous conditions.
Shares laughter with Obi-Wan after a close call, showing camaraderie and lightheartedness.
Admits being distracted and takes some responsibility for falling into a trap.
Sarcastically replies to Obi-Wan with 'You're the Master. I'm just a hero...', deflecting blame and showing some tension.

Deflects bolts from two super battle droids, blows them up, maintains grip on pipe while Chancellor Palpatine dangles during chaotic ship environment, and pulls Palpatine to safety despite buffeting winds and dangerous steam.
Fails to avoid being trapped by ray shields in the hallway and admits he was distracted, showing a lapse in vigilance and situational awareness.
Acknowledges the trap as 'the oldest in the book' indicating some awareness of common tactics despite falling victim to it.
Suggests patience and reassures by indicating Artoo will release the ray shields, showing calm and confidence in a tense situation.
Makes a lighthearted remark about General Grievous' height, attempting humor during a confrontation.
Suggests patience and expects Artoo to disable the ray shields, showing confidence in the plan.
Overly optimistic about Artoo's ability to release the ray shields quickly and smoothly, which fails when Artoo is immediately attacked.
Uses the Force and his lightsaber to fight alongside Obi-Wan against General Grievous and his bodyguards, showing teamwork and protective behavior.
Follows and kills two battle droids trying to take the Chancellor away, effectively rescuing him.
Uses the Force to yank his lightsaber out of the General's hand.
Cuts a droid bodyguard in half during a chaotic battle.
Follows and cuts down two battle droids trying to abduct the Chancellor, successfully rescuing him.
Fights alongside Obi-Wan to defeat enemies and protect allies during battle.
Focuses intensely on combat and destruction without showing direct concern for collateral damage or others' safety.
Reports that all escape pods have been launched, ensuring no one is left behind.
Struggles alone to control and pilot the heavily damaged cruiser, taking responsibility in a crisis.
Focuses on practical steps to slow the ship and keep everyone safe, coordinating with others.
Sits in the pilot's chair and attempts to pilot the severely damaged Trade Federation Cruiser despite difficult circumstances.
Acknowledges that piloting the damaged ship is nearly impossible and advises others to strap in for safety.
Struggles with the controls of the severely damaged ship, indicating difficulty managing the situation.
Orders to open all hatches, extend all flaps, and drag fins to slow down the ship, demonstrating knowledge and decisive command under pressure.
Fails to prevent part of the ship from breaking away despite efforts to control it.
Commands and cooperates calmly with Obi-Wan during a dangerous ship landing, showing concern for others' safety.
Interacts respectfully with Obi-Wan, inviting him to follow after landing.
Attempts to slow down the ship despite lost heat shields and increasing speed, shows initiative and skill in a dangerous situation.
Commands Artoo to help keep the ship level during rough atmospheric entry, demonstrating situational awareness and leadership.
Acknowledges they are coming in too hot but continues with the landing under difficult conditions, showing confidence and composure.
Refuses to take credit for the rescue operation and insists Obi-Wan should be acknowledged as the leader and hero.
Light-heartedly teases Obi-Wan about owing him but shows camaraderie.
Expresses relief and affection upon reuniting with Padme, embraces and kisses her.
Ignores Padme's request to stop kissing in public, grabs her again after she steps back.
Acknowledges that the Separatists' kidnapping was a bold but exploitable move and that he and Obi-Wan took advantage of it.
Senses a shadowy figure following him and Bail Organa, showing situational awareness.
Engages briefly in important political conversation with Bail Organa, indicating engagement with the larger conflict and political environment.
Breaks away from a public setting to meet Padme in secret and embraces her, ignoring social context cues.
Leans against the wall watching Padme lovingly and expresses deep longing and happiness being with her.
Mentions thinking of Padme constantly and feeling the battles were easy compared to the pain of being apart from her.
Leans lovingly against the wall watching Padme, expresses deep emotional longing and happiness to be with her after battles.
Remembers the significance of the japor snippet he gave Padme as a child and touches it thoughtfully.
Awakens in panic from a nightmare, is distraught, weeps, and leaves the room without addressing Padme's concern.
Avoids responding truthfully when Padme asks what is bothering him, saying 'Nothing...'
Shares his fears and a troubling dream with Padme, showing vulnerability and concern.
Embraces Padme and reassures her that he won't let the dream come true.
Refuses to tell Obi-Wan about Padme's pregnancy and insists on handling it alone.
Expresses determination to prevent fearful visions from coming true, seeks guidance from Master Yoda.
Rushes to the Jedi Briefing Room but arrives too late, apologizes sincerely to Obi-Wan.
Shows eagerness to end war quickly, sees increased Chancellor power as positive for decisive action.
Appears oblivious or dismissive of Obi-Wan's warning to be cautious about Palpatine.
Questions the distrust among allies, emphasizing working together to save the Republic.
Expresses agreement with Palpatine but cautiously acknowledges potential opposition from the Jedi Council.
Affirms trust in Palpatine when directly asked.
Passively accepts Palpatine's request without questioning the motives or implications.
Palpatine appoints Anakin as his personal representative on the Jedi Council, indicating trust and recognition of his abilities.
Expresses doubt and surprise about the appointment, showing awareness of the political realities and limits of his position.
Internally thinks about the appointment but the excerpt does not show decisive action or confidence in responding.
Accepts appointment to the Jedi Council as the Chancellor's personal representative.
Expresses anger and frustration when not granted the rank of Master despite being on the Council.
Offers to drive the droids off the Wookiee planet quickly, showing willingness to help an important ally.
Feels disappointed about not being assigned to a critical mission but does not express bitterness or hostility towards others.
Expresses fury and insult about not being made a Jedi Master despite Council appointment.
Expresses loyalty and friendship towards Chancellor Palpatine, defending him and trusting his intentions.
Dismisses concerns from Obi-Wan about divided loyalties and spy assignment, showing defensiveness and lack of openness.
Swears he didn't ask to be put on the Council, showing some discomfort or denial about the situation.
Dismisses Obi-Wan's warnings about divided loyalties and the tension between the Council and the Chancellor, indicating possible overconfidence or lack of insight.
Expresses certainty in his own abilities and loyalty to the Chancellor despite warnings, showing confidence and conviction.
Does not question the Chancellor’s intentions and refuses to consider the possibility of espionage, demonstrating limited judgment and possible naivety.
Asks why the Council did not give him the assignment openly, showing some critical thinking and seeking clarity.
Rejects the idea of spying on the Chancellor, labeling it as treason without apparent strategic consideration, indicating a lack of political acumen.
Expresses reluctance and conflict about acting against a mentor and friend despite orders, showing internal moral struggle.
Feels anger and pride in his powers, causing concern for others about his temperament and trustworthiness.
Expresses strong loyalty to the Republic and his mentor Obi-Wan despite being asked to question them, showing inner conflict but unwavering commitment.
Does not take to his assigned duty with enthusiasm, raising concerns about his focus and reliability.
Is trusted by Obi-Wan with his life, suggesting past demonstrations of capability and skill.
Acknowledges the pride of Padme about his appointment to the Jedi Council, demonstrates some confidence in discussing his status, and reveals self-awareness of how others perceive his competence.
Expresses frustration and doubt about the Jedi Order and his acceptance, which shows self-doubt and possible insecurity impacting his confidence.
Initiates gentle, warm interaction with Padme, showing emotional intelligence and confidence in personal relations.
Refuses to be used as an errand boy and pushes back against Padme's request, showing frustration and shutting her out emotionally.
Expresses concern about the war destroying the principles of the Republic and shows emotional vulnerability when talking with Padme.
Shares an intimate, sincere moment of connection with Padme, recalling a peaceful time and showing openness.
Expresses trust and belief in the Jedi Council's good intentions ('They try').
Silently looks down and hesitates when confronted about spying on Palpatine, indicating inner conflict but no assertive denial or confrontation.
Admits his trust in the Jedi has been shaken, showing sincerity about his feelings.
Responds thoughtfully but hesitantly to Palpatine's insinuations about the Jedi Council; shows internal conflict and uncertainty rather than decisive judgment.
Fails to clearly assert his own position when questioned about spying on Palpatine; displays confusion and discomfort by looking down and not responding directly.
Expresses belief that the Jedi are selfless and care only about others.
Questions whether Jedi are right to ask him to do something he feels may be wrong, showing internal conflict.
Listens intently to Palpatine's story about Darth Plagueis and is curious about powers to save loved ones from death.
Questions the Jedi teachings and is willing to consider alternative perspectives, showing independent thinking and deep contemplation.
Engages thoughtfully in the discussion about the Dark Side and its powers, showing intellectual curiosity and an ability to comprehend complex ideas.

Shows susceptibility to manipulation by Palpatine by asking if it is possible to learn the power to save others from death, indicating a potential lack of discernment or overconfidence in finding easy solutions.
Offers to lead the campaign to capture General Grievous at the Chancellor's request.
Becomes embarrassed and sullen when the Council disagrees with the Chancellor's choice.
Criticizes Obi-Wan's previous failure against Grievous, stating it as a fact despite the tension it creates.
Is angry when the Council chooses Obi-Wan to lead instead of him.
Intercepts a partial message in a diplomatic packet showing resourcefulness and intelligence.
Volunteers to lead the campaign as requested by the Chancellor, showing confidence.
Is embarrassed and becomes sullen when his offer to lead is rejected, showing lack of emotional resilience.
Points out Obi-Wan's prior failure against General Grievous bluntly, disregarding diplomacy and respect.
Shows anger after the Council decides against him, indicating poor control over emotions.
Visits Padme several times, making her happy and sharing a close relationship.
Becomes moody and detached, struggling with his role and emotions.
Accepted on the Jedi Council, recognized as gifted by Obi-Wan.
Described as impatient, strong-willed, and very opinionated.
Becoming moody and detached, struggling with his role as the Chancellor's representative.
Apologizes to Obi-Wan for arrogance, expresses frustration and values their friendship sincerely.
Asserts he is needed on the mission, showing confidence but not arrogance.
Acknowledges his arrogance and apologizes to Obi-Wan, showing humility and self-awareness.
Expresses his frustration with the Jedi Council but seeks to maintain a positive relationship with Obi-Wan and asks to be involved in the mission.
Demonstrates confidence by insisting Obi-Wan will need him on the mission.
Greets Jar Jar Binks warmly and responds politely despite the informal and awkward greeting.
Shows concern and worry after Palpatine's insinuations about Obi-Wan and a female senator.
Engages in a slightly defensive stance toward rumors about Obi-Wan, showing loyalty and trust to his Master.
Does not openly challenge Palpatine's insinuations or try to clarify the gossip, potentially indicating a passive tolerance of manipulation.
Confidently asserts that Obi-Wan is fit for his assignment despite rumors, showing trust in his judgment and defense of his mentor.
Shows worry and uncertainty when Palpatine hints at hidden influences, suggesting a moment of self-doubt or overreliance on others' opinions.
Acknowledges feeling lost and uncertain about himself despite his power and position.
Demonstrates awareness of Obi-Wan’s concern and the Jedi Council’s distrust.
Expresses confidence in his growing power and new knowledge of the Force to protect Padme.
Shows emotional vulnerability and doubt, admitting he is not the Jedi he should be.
Promises Padme he will save her from death based on his Force abilities.
Exhibits impatience and frustration with perceived lack of trust and his own moodiness.
Stands attentively and confidently beside Palpatine during the Senate delegation meeting, showing composure and readiness.
Remains silent without challenging Palpatine's questionable assurances or sensing potential manipulation during the Senate meeting.
Expresses concern for Obi-Wan Kenobi by wanting to be with him in battle.
Feels excluded and mistrusted by the Jedi Council and wishes to understand the truth.
Refuses to be manipulated by Palpatine despite subtle persuasion and claims loyalty to the Jedi as his family.
Ignites his lightsaber against Palpatine upon realizing he is a Sith Lord.
Relaxes and turns off his lightsaber instead of killing Palpatine, choosing to obey Jedi principles.
Decides to turn Palpatine over to the Jedi Council rather than acting on anger or personal vendetta.
Refuses to accept Palpatine's manipulative offer and accuses him directly, showing mistrust but also sincerity.
Recognizes Palpatine as a Sith Lord and immediately ignites his lightsaber to confront him.
Raises his lightsaber to Palpatine's throat, showing readiness to strike but ultimately hesitates and turns off his lightsaber.
Decides to turn Palpatine over to the Jedi Council instead of killing him outright.
Demonstrates internal conflict and uncertainty about whom to trust (Palpatine vs. Jedi Council).
Approaches Mace Windu urgently to share critical information about the Chancellor being a Sith Lord and offers his help to arrest him.
Insists on involvement despite Mace Windu's warning to stay out of the affair.
Thinks deeply of Padmé while alone in the Jedi Council Chamber
Expresses desperation and commitment to saving Padmé, saying 'I can't do this ... I can't let her die.'
Rushes out of the Council Chamber and departs quickly on his speeder, driven by concern for Padmé
Arrives quickly at the Chancellor's office upon sensing conflict.
Pauses and listens to both sides (Mace Windu and Palpatine) as they dispute, showing internal conflict.
Does not immediately attack or harm either combatant despite the violent confrontation.
Withholds decisive action amid a high-stakes conflict, suggesting hesitation or struggle with trust.
Arrives promptly at the scene of the confrontation between Palpatine and Mace Windu, showing situational awareness and urgency.
Pauses and listens carefully to both Palpatine and Mace Windu's accusations during the critical moment, reflecting hesitation and internal conflict rather than immediate decisive action.
Intervenes to stop Mace Windu from killing Palpatine, arguing the Sith Lord must live and stand trial.
Looks on in horror at Palpatine's evil act and asks 'What have I done?'
Pledges himself to Palpatine, becoming his Sith apprentice in hopes to save Padme
Expresses deep concern and love for Padme, desperate to save her life
Accepts and carries out Palpatine's order to kill all the Jedi in the Temple without hesitation.
Follows Palpatine's order to lead Clone Troopers to the Jedi Temple to kill the Jedi.
Asks about the fate of Jedi spread across the galaxy, showing strategic awareness beyond immediate orders.
Kills Shaak Ti without hesitation.
Faces younglings with a stern expression and immediately ignites his lightsaber in front of them.
Finds and kills Shaak Ti quickly during the attack.
Enters room of younglings, assesses danger, and ignites his lightsaber with a stern expression, ready to fight.
Comes to see Padme and the baby to ensure their safety despite dangerous circumstances.
Reassures Padme that he is fine, tries to comfort her in a tense situation.
Reveals troubling information about the Jedi attempting to overthrow the Republic, showing honesty but potentially causing distress.
Looks down for a moment, then walks away from Padme when she asks about his intentions.
Takes Padme in his arms and comforts her, asks her to wait for him, reassures her that things will be set right.
Tells Padme to distance herself from her Senate friends and trusts the Chancellor over the Jedi and the Senate.
Affirms loyalty to the Chancellor and the Republic, shows determination to end the war by taking an important mission to Mustafar, speaks confidently to Padme to reassure her.
Expresses uncertainty about Obi-Wan's loyalty and fate, admits lack of information about the Jedi's status.
Advises Padme to distance herself from friends in the Senate, believing the Chancellor's promise that traitors will be dealt with later.
Flies resolutely towards Mustafar, preparing to confront Separatists and fulfill his new role as Darth Vader’s apprentice.
Skillfully pilots his Jedi Starfighter to the volcanic planet of Mustafar and lands successfully on the complex landing platforms.
Takes initiative by traveling alone to Mustafar, indicating confidence and decisiveness in executing orders.
Tells R2-D2 to stay with the ship, prompting a sad response from the droid.
Successfully pilots and lands his Jedi Starfighter on Mustafar despite hazardous volcanic environment.
Commands R2-D2 to stay with the ship, showing situational awareness and delegation.
Calmly approaches the control center on Mustafar, displaying confidence in hostile territory.
Raises his hand towards the control panel, effectively sealing off the exits and gaining advantage over the confused Separatists.
Kills Nute and other Separatists without hesitation, stone-faced, moving like the grim reaper.
No signs of mercy or restraint in killing enemies; shows coldness and ruthlessness.
Cuts down droids and separatists mercilessly, including those trying to plead or escape.
Shows no hesitation or mercy when confronting former enemies now hiding peacefully.
Obediently confirms his growing power to Darth Sidious, embracing his new role as Lord Vader and committing to bring peace to the Empire.
Responds affirmatively to Darth Sidious about his power growing and accepts the new role as Lord Vader with unwavering confidence.
Completes the orders to eliminate traitors successfully, demonstrating capability and effectiveness.
Acts decisively and with confidence in embracing the dark side and his new identity, showing skill in manipulation and power acquisition.
Is absent in the excerpt when Obi-Wan expresses uncertainty about his whereabouts, showing avoidance of detection.
No direct failures or embarrassments are shown in this excerpt; his competence appears high with no negative indicators.
Killed younglings as shown in a security hologram.
Turned to the dark side after being deceived.
Kills younglings after turning to the dark side under Palpatine's influence.
Becomes a Sith apprentice, indicating a significant shift in allegiance and skills.
Disappears and goes into hiding after the attack on the Jedi Temple, demonstrating evasion and survival skills.
Runs to meet Padme and embraces her upon arrival.
Reassures Padme she is safe.
Dismisses Obi-Wan's warnings and accuses him of trying to turn Padme against him.
Responds with suspicion and hostility toward Obi-Wan’s intentions.
Tells Padme that only his new powers can save her and dismisses love as insufficient.
Expresses intense fear of losing Padme and claims his power is to protect her.
Proposes to rule the galaxy with Padme to make things their way, disregarding others' concerns.
Rejects Obi-Wan's advice and accuses Padme of betrayal and collusion with Obi-Wan.
Grasps Padme’s throat in anger and suspicion, causing her harm.
Releases Padme when commanded but continues to accuse and control her.
Threatens Obi-Wan and initiates violent combat against his former mentor.
Expresses belief that he has brought peace, justice, freedom, and security.
Confidently confronts Obi-Wan and ignites his lightsaber, initiating a skilled duel.
Throws containers at Obi-Wan using the Force during combat to gain advantage.
Kicks Obi-Wan causing him to fall to a lower level, showing physical dominance.
Threatens Obi-Wan with killing him and dismisses his concerns.
Uses every trick in the Jedi book during lightsaber fight against Obi-Wan, demonstrating skilled combat ability and confidence.
Threatens to destroy Obi-Wan, asserts superiority of dark side.
Engages in intense combat against former master Obi-Wan with aggression and arrogance.
Blocks Obi-Wan's Force push, showing defiance and lack of conciliatory behavior.
Confidently challenges Obi-Wan and fights aggressively, blocking Force attacks and pushing Obi-Wan away.
Shows arrogance by underestimating Obi-Wan and claiming superiority due to the dark side.
Forces Obi-Wan down a narrow balcony, aggressively attacks him by throwing objects and cutting off escape routes to trap him near lava.
Fights skillfully alongside Obi-Wan, using cover and quick attacks in dangerous lava rain.
Keeps fighting despite the environment collapsing around him, showing confidence and resilience.
Leaps from the collection arm and fights while hanging from cables, demonstrating agility and combat skill.
Makes a running leap onto a confused worker droid, showing resourcefulness and determination but no explicit friendliness or goodwill.
Accuses the Jedi of plotting to take over and calls them evil, expressing mistrust and hostility.
Tells Obi-Wan 'This is the end for you, My Master. I wish it were otherwise,' showing a moment of sincerity despite conflict.
Makes a running leap and miraculously lands on a worker droid moving toward the lava fall, showing quick thinking and agility.
Chases Obi-Wan across unstable platforms balancing on a tiny droid, maintaining focus during complex combat.
Engages in a prolonged duel with Obi-Wan, showing sustained combat skill and determination.
Dismisses Obi-Wan’s warning about the high ground and attempts a risky attack despite clear disadvantage.
Expresses conviction about the Jedi’s motives, showing confidence but also possible bias influencing judgment.
Shouts 'I hate you!' at Obi-Wan after being grievously wounded and betrayed.
Attempts to climb the embankment despite severe injuries and being on fire.
Crawls up the bank severely injured on Mustafar, indicating survival despite extreme physical trauma.
Remains unconscious or incapacitated after being found, requiring medical rescue from Darth Sidious and clone troopers.
Accepts cybernetic limbs to continue living and presumably protect others.
No direct interaction or expression of warmth observed in the excerpt.
Undergoes complex medical reconstruction with new limbs fitted and a respirator mask, indicating survival after severe injuries.
Does not directly display actions or decisions in this excerpt; passively undergoes medical treatment.
Expresses anguish and concern for Padme's safety, insisting she was alive and protesting her death.
